Summary: Glowing fireball moving slower than an airplane
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Mumbai
There were no other sightings in Mumbai on or around May 18th 2010
divs: Sighting Detailsi saw the ufo at about 23:08 hrs Indian Standard Time. i noticed the unusual light, (am used to noticing movements as i am a birdwatcher and a naturalist) the direction of the ufo was from west towards south-east and passed close to the most prominent part of scorpius (the 3 starts in a row at the head), took a slow (almost) 90 degree turn towards ophiuchus and it started getting dimmer and seemed to be slowing down. it kept moving in the same direction and after about a minute or so seemed to gain altitude. i kept going to places where i could see it but after a while could not spot it in the sky. before posting this sighting i took a gps noting from the place i had seen the ufo N 19,12.629 E 72,49.448 this whole incident lasted for about 5-6 minutes.
